refnamediv.refpurpose: Modulates one a-rate signal by a second one.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Modulates one a-rate signal by a second one.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kzamod -- controls which za variable is used for modulation. A positive value means additive modulation, a negative value means multiplicative modulation. A value of 0 means no change to asig.

zamod modulates one a-rate signal by a second one, which comes from a za variable. The location of the modulating variable is controlled by the i-rate or k-rate variable kzamod. This is the a-rate version of zkmod.
